meanings: (신원을) identify [명사] confirmation, (formal) verification, (신원의) identification, [동사] confirm, check, make sure (of/that), make certain (that), (formal) verify, (formal) ascertain

vlive.korean: 아직 확인을 못 해봐서... I haven't checked it out yet. 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: I haven't checked it out yet.

vlive.korean: 제가 확인 여기서 안 된다고 하면 어쩔 수 없고 된다고 하면은 좋은 거고 - 뭐 뭐? I'll check here. If it's not possible, then nothing can be done. If they can, it's good. - What? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: I'll check here. If it's not possible, then nothing can be done. If they can, it's good. - What?

vlive.korean: 확인해볼까? Let's go and check. 듣기 View video SF9 : 얘드라일어나바
[공권력 로비] 나 좀 확인해 주면 안 돼? [Lobbying] Can you check for me? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
버논아 저 위에 박스 확인해봤냐? Vernon, did you check the box over there? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
vlive.english: Vernon, did you check the box over there?
